DOC.HEADLINE: EAST VALLEY FOCUS : MISSION HILLS ; CHAMBER TO GREET ITS NEW PRESIDENT
DOC.TEXT: The Mission Hills Chamber_of_Commerce will honor outgoing president Bert Brunwin and welcome incoming president Denise Jo Crangle at its 39th annual installation ceremony Friday . " We ' re just going_to be enjoying ourselves , having a good time , " Brunwin said. " We ' ve doubled our membership over the past year , and we ' re very proactive with the police . We ' ve worked very hard to try and stop the cruising problem here on weekends. " The Mission Hills Chamber now has about 120 members , Brunwin said . Los Angeles City Councilman Richard Alarcon will be the installing officer this year , and radio personality Humble Harve will emcee the event , which begins at 6 p.m. at the Odyssey Restaurant , 15600 Odyssey Drive , Granada Hills . Members of other San Fernando Valley chambers are invited to attend . MIGUEL BUSTILLO
